# ML Consuming Blueprints

## What are ML Consuming Blueprints?

ML Consuming Blueprints are templates for a retrieving predictions from a model, that is served by a Model-Serving-Service.
It showcases how to consume the model predictions in a microservice architecture via the FastIoT framework.

## Pytorch Regression Consuming Blueprint

```{index} triple: Pytorch; Regression; Consuming
```

 <span class="index-entry">Consuming</span>
